courses.c_content:
<ul>
<li>R的介紹，以及Windows環境下R的安裝；安裝R Studio
<li>R 的資料結構包括向量、隨機物件、矩陣、列表、因子和資料框
<li>資料輸入：從外部來源和程式（例如 Excel 檔案）匯入和匯出資料到 R，以及如何儲存和擷取程式。
<li>使用資料程式設計（1）：在 R 中使用資料程式設計的基本語句，使用等式/不等式、for 迴圈、重複、if/else語句；編寫函數。
<li>使用資料程式設計（2）：R 中的進階功能，例如預處理、基本資料整理、排序和過濾。
<li>繪製資料：在 R 中繪製簡單資料集以及與繪圖函數相關的各種視覺表示。
<li>基本統計函數：使用基本統計函數提取和處理子樣本，使用GGplot和QQplot繪製更複雜的資料集。
<li>基本統計函數：在 R 中執行簡單檢定和迴歸分析。
courses.c_objective: 本課程為數據分析員而設，旨在教授學員應用R 語言，編寫出能有效分析各類數據及繪製良好圖表之程式，以讓學員可從數據中抽出所需要的匯總信息及圖表，提升學員之工作能力及競爭力。
courses.e_content:
<ul>
<li>Introduction to R, and installation of R in the Windows environment; Installation of R Studio
<li>Data Structures of R including Vectors, Random Objects, Matrices, Lists, Factors, and Data Frames
<li>Data Input: importing and exporting data from external sources and programs, such as Excel file, into R, and how to save and retrieve your program.
<li>Programming with Data (1): basic statements for programming with data in R, using equality / inequality, for loops, repeats, if / else statements;  Writing functions.
<li>Programming with Data (2): advanced functions in R such as preprocessing, basic data wrangling, ordering and filtering.
<li>Plotting Data: plot simple data sets in R and the variety of visual representations associated with the plot function.
<li>Basic Statistical Functions: extract and work with subsamples using basic statistical functions, plotting more complex data sets using GGplot and QQplot.
<li>Basic Statistical Functions: perform simple tests and regression analysis in R.
courses.e_objective: This course is designed for data analysts, aiming to teach participants how to use the R programming language to write efficient code for analyzing diverse datasets and creating high-quality visualizations. By mastering these skills, learners will be able to extract key insights and generate meaningful summaries and charts from data, ultimately enhancing their professional capabilities and career competitiveness.

courses.c_objective: 此課程旨在協助學員掌握有關「環境、社會與治理」（ESG）的基礎知識及發展趨勢，使個人或企業能够理解如何在不斷變化的環境中有效實施可持續發展策略。
courses.e_content:
1. Introduction
    • What is ESG
    • Core components
    • Brief overview of ESG evolution
    • Why it matters
  2. Environmental in ESG
    • Key issues – climate change, energy, waste, biodiversity
    • Initiatives – carbon neutrality, Net Zero Alliance
    • Metrics
    • Case study
  3. Social in ESG
    • Key issues – diversity, equity, labor rights, engagement, health & safety, cybersecurity
    • Initiatives – FAIRR, “Find It, Fix It, Prevent It” (FFP)
    • Metrics
    • Case study
  4. Governance in ESG
    • Key issues – corruption, proper management, anti-competition practices, ethical decision making, board diversity
    • Importance for trust and accountability
    • Metrics and standards
    • Case study
  5. Implementation and challenges
    • Push backs
    • Reporting
    • Goal setting
    • Stakeholder engagement
  6. What role can you be
    • Stakeholders and their influence – investors, employees, regulators, communities
  7. Carbon market
    • Voluntary and mandatory
    • Standards and measurement
  8. The future of ESG
  9. Wrap up
courses.e_title: Introduction to ESG: Environmental, Social & Governance Issues
courses.e_objective: This course is designed to help participants acquire a foundational understanding of “Environmental, Social and Governance” (ESG) issues and trends, enabling individuals and organizations to effectively implement sustainable development strategies in a constantly changing environment.

courses.c_title: AI 驅動 3D 創作 - 從模型生成到場景建構
courses.c_objective: 本課程專注AI 3D模型生成技術實務應用，學員將透過AI工具產出可編輯模型，結合專業材質庫與光影設計完成商業級3D作品。課程涵蓋AI模型生成與迭代、材質優化、跨軟體協作等關鍵技能，剖析AI生成模型的優勢與限制，培養學員產出高品質3D內容的核心競爭力，並有能力使用現有3D 軟體作整合應用。
courses.c_remark: 本課程部分內容將使用第三方網上服務（如AI工具）。這些服務通常會為新用戶提供一定次數的免費試用，足以協助完成課程的部分操作練習。為確保學員全面掌握相關技術，導師會在課堂上進行完整而詳細的演示，即使不額外購買次數，學員仍能充分理解課程內容並獲得良好的學習成果。請注意，這些第三方服務的費用不包含於課程費用內，學員可自由選擇是否補充使用。
courses.e_content:
• AI Model Generation and Basic Processing: Demonstrate and use 3D generation tools to create models with topological structures from images.
  • Blender Core Fundamentals: Lighting, Shadows, and Color: Optimize model surfaces, design appropriate lighting and shadow gradients, learn color theory and material representation, and integrate color performance and three-dimensionality through rendering.
  • Post-Processing and Final Output: Enhance stylistic effects using compositing nodes (filters), refine details, and export formats optimized for social media sharing.
courses.e_title: AI-Driven 3D Creation: From Model Generation to Scene Construction
courses.e_objective: This course focuses on the practical application of AI-driven 3D model generation techniques. Students will create editable models using AI tools, combining professional material libraries and lighting designs to complete commercial-grade 3D projects. This course covers essential skills such as AI model generation and iteration, material optimization, and cross-software collaboration. It also delves into the strengths and limitations of AI-generated models, equipping students with the core competency to produce high-quality 3D content and integrate it seamlessly with existing 3D software.
courses.e_remark: Some parts of this course will involve the use of third-party online services (such as AI tools). These services often provide new users with a limited number of free usage attempts, which can support part of the exercises. To ensure every student gains a full understanding, the instructor will provide comprehensive demonstrations, so even without additional usage, you’ll still benefit fully from the learning experience. Please note that these third-party services are independent of the course fee, and it’s entirely up to you whether to purchase extra usage.

courses.c_title: 推行 ISO 9001:2015 質量管理系統工作坊
courses.c_objective: 協助學員掌握有關建立及推行ISO 9001:2015質量管理系統的重點及要訣，亦可為學員將來參與ISO 9001內部審核技巧/主任評審員課程及ISO 9000國際標準認識水平測試奠下穩固的知識基礎。
courses.c_remark:
1. 凡符合以下條件的本地機構贊助其員工修讀上述課程，可申請「國際標準認證培訓鼓勵計劃」：
    • CPTTM 認證資助計劃合資格申請機構 或
    • 考獲ISO 標準認證的本地機構。
  2. 遞交報名表時，報讀者必須一併提交「國際標準認證培訓鼓勵計劃」申請表格。
  3. 學員不能同時使用「國際標準認證培訓鼓勵計劃」及「教育暨青年局持續進修發展計劃」(如適用)。

courses.e_title: Implementing ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System Workshop
courses.e_objective: This course aims to provide participants with comprehensive training on the essentials of setting up and implementing an ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System. It also serves as a solid foundation for participants planning to attend ISO 9001 internal auditing skills / Lead Assessor training and International Test of Understanding of ISO 9000 standards.
courses.e_remark:
1. Local organizations sponsoring their employees to enroll in the above training course can apply for the "Training Incentive Scheme for International Management System Certification" if they meet the following criteria:
    • qualified applicants of the CPTTM certification subsidy scheme or
    • local organizations certified to specified ISO standards.
  2. The Training Incentive Application Form must be submitted together with the Course Enrollment Form.
  3. "Training Incentive Scheme for International Management System Certification" and "DSEJ's Continuing Education Development Program" cannot be used together (if applicable).

courses.c_content:
1. ISO 22000系統條文
    • 何謂管理系統及戴明 PDCA 循環
    • 食物安全管理系統的目的及益處
    • ISO 22000 系列與術語
    • ISO 22000 條文
      • 第四節 組織的境況
      • 第五節 領導素質
      • 第六節 規劃
      • 第七節 支援
      • 第八節 營運
      • 第九節 績效評價
      • 第十節 改進
  2. 建立食品安全管理系統的框架
    • 確定影響管理系統的各種外在和內在因素和關係方的需要和期望
    • 確定範圍
    • 制定方針和目標和應對風險和機遇
    • 透過《前提方案(PRP)》、《操作性前提方案 (oPRP)》和《危害分析和關鍵控制點 (HACCP)》去管理食品安全的風險
  3. 溝通和緊急事故
    • 內部溝通
    • 外部溝通
    • 管理緊急情況
  4. 確認、控制和驗證
    • 執行確認
    • 控制
    • 驗證
  5. 改進食品安全管理體系
    • 持續改進的概念
    • 執行管理評審
  6. 筆試/測驗
courses.c_title: 推行ISO 22000食品安全管理體系
courses.c_objective:
課程完成後，學員應能：
  • 明確了解ISO22000:2018的內涵；
  • 掌握編寫ISO22000:2018系統文件的知識，及
  • 制定措施以建立ISO22000:2018食品安全管理系統。

courses.e_content:
1. Requirements of the ISO 22000 standard
    • What is a management system and Deming PDCA cycle
    • Purpose and benefits of a food safety management system (FSMS)
    • ISO 22000 series and terminology (PRP, oPRP, HACCP)
    • ISO 22000 requirements
      • Clause 4 Context of the organization
      • Clause 5 Leadership
      • Clause 6 Planning
      • Clause 7 Support
      • Clause 8 Operation
      • Clause 9 Performance evaluation
      • Clause 10 Improvement
  2. Developing a framework for the FSMS
    • Identify the various external and internal factors affecting the management system and the needs and expectations of the interested parties
    • Define scope
    • Establish policy & objectives, actions to address risks and opportunities
    • Managing food safety risk through PRP, oPRP and HACCP
  3. Communication and emergency
    • Internal communication
    • External communication
    • Managing emergency situations
  4. Validation, monitoring and verification
    • Implementing validation
    • Monitoring
    • Verification
  5. Improving the FSMS
    • Concept of continual improvement
    • Implementing management review
  6. Written test/exam
courses.e_title: Implementing ISO 22000 Food Safety Management System
courses.e_objective:
Upon completion of the course, participants should have acquired:
  • a clear understanding of the intent of the ISO 22000: 2018 requirements;
  • the knowledge to prepare the various types of documents needed for the ISO 22000: 2018 system;
  • the knowledge to formulate the steps for implementing a Food Safety Management System to meet the ISO 22000: 2018 requirements.
